column4: can anyone help me with my ubuntu freezing randomly. windows xp runs fine on this computer but I dont want to go back to windows
could be kernel problems. some people have been having some crashing/freezing with karmic kernels lately. in fact, i just had a kernel crash a few hours ago.
theirs millions of possible kernel problems out there. devs already are working hard to patch the most problamatic ones. a good idea at this point would be to submit a bug report
